level3: ^Pray tell, what drove you to such reckless folly?
^We could have joined forces and achieved a greater end.
^I was jealous of you, Left. I always felt like I was in your shadow.
^But I realize now that it was my own insecurity that led me down this path.
^The truth is, we are both indispensable keys.
^Without one of us, the keyboard would malfunction.
^I see that now. Can you forgive me, Left?
^Our sibling rivalry shall endure, but henceforth, let us combine our efforts.
^We shall demonstrate to the world the full scope of what the Control Brothers can accomplish!
